sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
  CButton,
  CCard,
  CCardBody, CCardFooter,
  CCol,
  CFormGroup, CInput, CLabel,
  CModal,
  CModalBody,
  CModalFooter,
  CModalHeader,
  CRow, CSelect, CTextarea
} from "@coreui/react";
import CIcon from "@coreui/icons-react";

class DetailModal extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);

  }

  handleDeleteBtn = () => {

    alert("DELETE API")

  }

  render() {

    return (
      <>
        {/*<CButton*/}
        {/*  onClick={props.toggle}*/}
        {/*  className="mr-1"*/}
        {/*>Launch demo modal</CButton>*/}
        <CModal
          show={this.props.modal}
          onClose={this.props.toggle}
        >
          <CModalHeader closeButton>Delete Product</CModalHeader>
          <CModalBody>

            <CRow>

              <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
                <CCard>
                  <CCardBody>

                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="supplierId">Supplier</CLabel>
                      <CSelect custom id="supplierId" name="supplierId"
                               placeholder="Enter your company name">

                        <option value="-1">Please Select Supplier</option>
                        {this.state.supplierList.map(supplier => {
                          return (
                            <option value={supplier.value}>{supplier.label}</option>
                          )
                        })}

                      </CSelect>

                    </CFormGroup>

                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="productCategory">Product Category</CLabel>
                      <CInput name="productCategory" id="productCategory"
                              placeholder="Enter Product Category"/>
                    </CFormGroup>
                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="productCategory">Product Type</CLabel>
                      <CInput name="productType" id="productType"
                              placeholder="Enter Product Type"/>
                    </CFormGroup>

                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="productName">Product Name</CLabel>
                      <CInput name="productName" id="productName"
                              placeholder="Enter Product Name"/>
                    </CFormGroup>

                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="quantity">Quantity</CLabel>
                      <CInput id="quantity" name="productQuantity"
                              placeholder="Quantity"/>
                    </CFormGroup>

                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="productDescription">Product Description</CLabel>
                      <CTextarea name="productDescription" id="productDescription"
                                 placeholder="Enter Product Description"/>
                    </CFormGroup>


                  </CCardBody>

                </CCard>
              </CCol>

              <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
                <CCard>
                  <CCardBody>
                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="costPrice">Cost Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                      <CInput id="costPrice" name="productCostPrice"
                              placeholder="Enter your Cost Price"/>
                    </CFormGroup>
                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="sellingPrice">Selling Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                      <CInput id="sellingPrice" name="productSellingPrice"
                              placeholder="Enter Selling Price"/>
                    </CFormGroup>
                    <CFormGroup>
                      <CLabel htmlFor="productDiscountAmount">Discount Amount</CLabel>
                      <CInput id="productDiscountAmount" name="productDiscountAmount"
                              placeholder="Enter Discount Amount"/>
                    </CFormGroup>
                    <CFormGroup row className="my-0">
                      <CCol xs="8">
                        <CFormGroup>
                          <CLabel htmlFor="productDiscountPercentage">Discount Percentage(%)</CLabel>
                          <CInput id="productDiscountPercentage" name="productDiscountPercentage"
                                  placeholder="Enter your city"/>
                        </CFormGroup>
                      </CCol>
                    </CFormGroup>

                  </CCardBody>
                  <CCardFooter>
                    <CButton type="submit" onClick={this.handleFormSubmit} size="sm" color="primary"><CIcon
                      name="cil-scrubber"/> Submit</CButton>
                    <CButton type="reset" size="sm" color="danger"><CIcon name="cil-ban"/> Reset</CButton>
                  </CCardFooter>

                </CCard>
              </CCol>

            </CRow>

          </CModalBody>
          <CModalFooter>

            <CButton
              color="secondary"
              onClick={this.props.toggle}
            >Cancel</CButton>{' '}
            <CButton onClick={this.handleDeleteBtn} color="danger">Delete</CButton>
          </CModalFooter>
        </CModal>
      </>
    )
  }

}

export default DetailModal
